GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v5.4.220
GSD.description:
bnx2x: fix potential memory leak in bnx2x_tpa_stop()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.220 by commit 71e0ab5b7598d88001762fddbfeb331543c62841, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit 07b0f00964def8af9321cfd6c4a7e84f6362f728. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: bnx2x: fix potential memory leak in bnx2x_tpa_stop()
